permissions: Admins can list all equipment movement trips. Non-admins can list trips where they are a member of the broker, a manager of a related trucker via broker tenders, or the seller operations contact on a related job schedule shift.
validation_notes: Filters max-origin-at-min-min and max-origin-at-min-max must be parseable timestamps; the server parses them as UTC.

flags.name: --max-origin-at-min-min
flags.validation: Must be an ISO 8601 timestamp parseable by the server (example: 2025-01-01T00:00:00Z).

flags.name: --max-origin-at-min-max
flags.validation: Must be an ISO 8601 timestamp parseable by the server.

flags.name: --job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID.

flags.name: --job-production-plan-id
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID (alias filter).
